long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebTalker: Navigate the Web through Conversation

🌐 Introducing WebTalker – The Conversational Web Navigator
Activate WebTalker with a simple click, and start engaging with websites as though they're your personal assistants. Whether you're doing research, shopping, or just exploring, WebTalker simplifies your web interactions with intuitive, AI-powered chat functionalities.

👉 Key Features:

Active Chat: Engage with any website to ask questions, request summaries, or seek specific details—all through conversation. Why read through countless pages when you can save time and energy by just asking WebTalker?

💻 Getting Started Is Easy:

1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install WebTalker. Pin WebTalker to your toolbar.
2. Once installed, click the WebTalker icon in your toolbar to enable the chat feature on any webpage.
3. Begin your chat interactions immediately—use natural language or specific commands to communicate with webpages.

📪 We're Here to Help:
For support or to share your feedback, please contact us at webtalkerai@gmail.com. Your insights are invaluable as we continue to refine and enhance WebTalker.

Experience a smarter, more conversational way to browse. Install WebTalker today and be part of evolving the internet!
